dict.acceptation: 仔细的，小心的；周到的；慎；心细；

sent.orig: If be not, buy cannot, also persuade your discretion, careful, again careful!
sent.trans: 假如非买不可，也劝您谨慎，谨慎，再谨慎！

sent.orig: You must pay careful attention when doing accounts. You're likely to make errors if you're not careful.
sent.trans: 算账得专心，一不留意就爱出错。

sent.orig: He emphasized the importance of careful driving/that careful driving was important.
sent.trans: 他强调小心驾驶的重要性[小心驾驶很重要]。
杀手：小心点，斯图尔特，小心了。

sent.orig: I can see you're a careful reader as well as a careful observer.
sent.trans: 我能看出你既是一位细心的读者，又是一位观察者。
